mapper.select: SELECT book.BookId, book.BookName, book.BookAuthor, book.BookPicPath, borrow.*, IFNULL(a.RenewDay,0) AS RenewDay FROM borrow LEFT JOIN book ON book.BookId = borrow.BookId LEFT JOIN category ON category.CategoryId = book.CategoryId LEFT JOIN (SELECT BorrowId,sum(RenewDay) AS RenewDay FROM book_renew GROUP BY BorrowId ) AS a ON borrow.BorrowId = a.BorrowId WHERE borrow.BorrowId = #{id} AND borrow.IsReturn = 0
